text: No, at this time the knowledgebase does not support custom coded templates.

I am using the GitHub Action written by HubSpot, but it is failing every time
> Run npx @HubSpot/cli@3.0.4 upload src matterhorn --use-env
> npm ERR! could not determine executable to run
> Error: Process completed with exit code 1.
Is the provided <https://github.com/marketplace/actions/HubSpot-cms-deploy|HubSpot Deploy Action> failing for anyone else?
For what it’s worth – I was using 1.4 and needed to use the latest version 1.5
